name: de-eekhoorn/de-eekhoorn-php-sdk
description: Php package for communicating with the Eekhoorn API.

suggest.php-http/guzzle5-adapter: Install this package if Guzzle 5 is available in the application.
suggest.php-http/guzzle6-adapter: Install this package if Guzzle 6 is available in the application.
suggest.php-http/curl-client: Install this package if Guzzle is not available in the application, but curl is.
